summary: A BuzzFeed News reporter emails an unknown recipient, likely a law enforcement or corrections official, regarding a potential leak from paramedics about Jeffrey Epstein's death. The reporter states that posts on 4chan appeared 45 minutes before mainstream media reported Epstein's death and seeks verification and comment.

persons.name: Jane Lytvynenko
persons.context: BuzzFeed News reporter who is contacting an unknown recipient about potential leaks from paramedics regarding Jeffrey Epstein's death, citing 4chan posts that appeared before mainstream media reports.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Subject of the death report; the reporter is investigating potential leaks about his death before it was officially reported in mainstream media.

events.title: Reporter inquiry about Epstein death leak
events.description: BuzzFeed News reporter Jane Lytvynenko contacts an unknown recipient regarding potential leaks from paramedics about Jeffrey Epstein's death, citing 4chan posts that appeared 45 minutes before ABC News reported it.

keyFacts: A BuzzFeed News reporter suspects paramedics involved in responding to Jeffrey Epstein's death may have leaked information online before mainstream media reports.
Posts on the website 4chan, frequented by far-right trolls, were published 45 minutes before ABC News first reported Epstein's death.
The reporter is seeking verification of the information in the posts and a statement on the situation from the recipient.
